description.en:
“If there existed a tainted being among the hwarangs, who would it be? Of course, it’d be Seol Yeong-rang who uses sorcery to call upon spirits!”

Hwarang Seol Yeong, who was named as the tainted person who’d bring forth a great disaster one day.

There was only one way to get rid of the false accusations and return to his rightful position.

It was to prove he wasn’t tainted by evil spirits by solving abnormal incidents.

Then, Zaha, the governor of the previous generation’s hwarang, the man who killed a Great Chaotic God eight years back and disappeared without a trace, appeared in front of Seol Yeong…
description.fr:
« S’il existait un horrible fantôme parmi les Hwarangs, qui serait-il ? Bien sûr, ce serait Seol Yeong qui utilise la nécromancie pour invoquer les fantômes ! »

Hwarang Seol Yeong, qui avait été désigné comme l’horrible fantôme qui provoquerait un jour un grand désastre.

Il n’y avait qu’un seul moyen de se débarrasser de ces fausses accusations et de retrouver sa position initiale.

Il devait prouver qu’il n’était pas un horrible fantôme en résolvant des incidents anormaux.

C’est alors que Ja Ha, le chef du Hwarang de la génération précédente, l’homme qui a tué un grand esprit maléfique huit ans auparavant et qui a disparu sans laisser de traces, apparaît devant Seol Yeong…

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

description.en:
This Life, I Will Succeed

A mountain of corpses, a sea of blood.
At the summit, only two people remained.

"Why did you save me?"
"At last... you're looking at me."
"I'll ask again. Why did you save me?"

The man was curious.
It was natural.
The woman was his sworn enemy.
And their rivalry should have ended there.
The final act was to be his death.
Those he believed were his subordinates stabbed him in the back, and even more enemies rushed to target him.

"Answer me. Why did you keep me alive!"

"Don't cry..."

"Am I... crying?"

Hot tears were flowing from eyes he thought had dried up long ago.

"Just think of it as a bad dream. A very painful and terrible dream."
"But if our time together held any value at all."
"Even at the end of this nightmare, please find me again."

Thump thump thump thump.
The mountain of corpses began to rumble.
Simultaneously, beyond the blood-red earth, numerous flags rose amidst a hazy dust.

"Uaaaaaah!"
The man roared upon seeing the massive blood-colored flag.

"Mangcheon Assembly! I won't let you get away with this."

Will Cho Un-hwi, who has been given a new life, be able to find his bride-to-be?

title.en: I Have Zero Magic Power, But I’m The Strongest With Physical Magic!

description.en:
In a world where magic determines your worth, the protagonist, Apollo, has no magic power at all. No matter how much he trains, he is unable to use magic. But when the village elder calls him a good-for-nothing and plans to exile him from the village, Apollo discovers that he doesn’t possess “Magic Power,” but rather “Physical Force.” Using this “Physical Force” for magical feats, he uncovers an unimaginable strength far beyond conventional magic. Apollo receives an invitation from the capital city and, along with his childhood friend Luna, who is the only one who ever truly believed in him, sets off on a journey away from his hometown!

This is the story of a world where a guaranteed way to turn one’s life around exists. A tale of a boy’s rise from adversity in an otherworldly fantasy begins now!

altTitles.ja: 死して生きるSSS級ハンター

altTitles.th: นักล่าพลีชีพ ระดับ SSS

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS-Class-Revival-Hunter/46)
description.ja:
Fランクのおちこぼれハンター「孔子」 ランキング１位の「炎帝」を妬む日々を過ごしていた孔子は、ある日「敵のスキルをコピーできる」というS級スキルを手に入れる。 しかし喜びも束の間、このスキル…何かがおかしい！！ なに！？発動条件がオレの死…？最高のハンターを目指す孔子の挑戦が始まる…！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/65543)
description.ko:
F급 말단 헌터 ‘김공자‘.
랭킹 1위 ‘염제‘를 부러워하던 어느 날, 무려 S+급 스킬을 얻는다.
하지만 기쁨도 잠시, 어째 스킬 내용이 이상하다?!
 
상대의 스킬 중 1개를 복사한다,까지는 좋은데…
 
"뭐? 내가 죽어야만 발동된다고?!"
 
죽어야 사는 헌터의 인간찬가 <SSS급 죽어야 사는 헌터>

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/SSS%EA%B8%89-%EC%A3%BD%EC%96%B4%EC%95%BC-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%ED%97%8C%ED%84%B0/2454)
description.th:
เป็นตอนที่ทำให้เสียน้ำตาแบบมากๆตั้งแต่พาเนลที่พระเอกเดินเข้ามาในบ้านยันตอนสุดท้ายที่ปลอบโยนดวงวิญญาณ ไม่ใช่การกำจัดบอสเพราะต้อง"กำจัด"เพียงอย่างเดียว แต่พระเอกตกตระกอนความคิดตอนเห็นเรื่องราวในอดีตได้เลยเลือกที่จะกำจัดโดยใช้วิธีปลอบโยนแทน มันแบบ อือ เหมียนหมา

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9E_%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A_SSS/98)
description.pt-br:
Eu também quero uma habilidade Rank S! Eu quero tanto que eu poderia morrer por isso!

[Você despertou uma habilidade Rank S.] [Mas só funciona quando você morre.]
Eh !? DO QUE ELA VAI SERVIR SE EU JÁ ESTIVER MORTO!?
description.zh-hk:
身處F級底層的獵人「金孔子」
長久以來一直羨慕著排行第一的獵人「炎帝」。
某天，他竟突然獲得了S+級的技能。
不料，短暫開心過後，
他發現這個技能有些古怪?!

「複製對方的其中一種技能」
到這裡都還不錯...

「什麼?竟然要我死了才能發動?!」

重生獵人的人生樂章——
《SSS級死而復生的獵人》

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS%E7%B4%9A%E6%AD%BB%E8%80%8C%E5%BE%A9%E7%94%9F%E7%9A%84%E7%8D%B5%E4%BA%BA/96)

altTitles.ja: 先輩、ちょっといいですか?

altTitles.en: Senpai, Can I Have a Moment?

altTitles.vi: “Senpai, anh có thể cho em một chút thời gian được không?

description.en: A super-sheltered girl, Shiranui Rei, has a lot of things she doesn’t know! She asks her questions to her senior, who is also a library committee member. But sometimes, her questions are hard to answer…!?
description.vi: Cô gái giàu có và được nuông chiều 不知火零(Shiranui Rei) không biết nhiều điều về thế giới xung quanh! Cô thường hỏi những điều không hiểu cho đàn anh của cô ở câu lạc bộ thư viện. Nhưng những câu hỏi của cô đôi khi lại khó trả lời lắm…!?

altTitles.ja: 妖怪生徒シリーズ

description.en: A 4-koma about the lives of the youkai at Youkai-Academy

altTitles.en: There Are No Red Flowers for Ten Days

altTitles.es-la: Venganza de la Flor de Ciruelo

description.en:
The scripture that brought a bloodstorm to Jianghu was the "Wisdom of the Secret Master," a legendary book that is said to hold the power to seize all the world's authority and wealth. Because of it, Woonseon lost all his loved ones overnight. 
Now, he casts aside his bright and pure past and embarks on a desperate journey for revenge. The flower will wither in ten days. Nothing in this world will be eternal, whether it's wealth, power, or love.

The ruthless criminal “Great,” exiled to space for his countless crimes, is banished to the past alongside the King of the Universe, “Rohollah,” after their encounter in space. Great attempts to right the numerous wrongs he committed in the past to try and rewrite a better future…
description.ru: Преследуемый космосом за неисчисляемые злодеяния безумный преступник Великий после встречи с королём космоса Рохум Рогахой был отправлен в прошлое. Но сможет ли Великий исправить ошибки прошлого и переписать будущее...

altTitles.ja: 筋力無双

description.en:
In modern Japan, a mysterious gate leading to another world suddenly appeared, unleashing monstrous beings called demons that spread chaos. The only ones capable of standing against them were heroes wielding skills and magic. However, the protagonist, Kengo Kuromiya, a man with no abilities, possessed a unique constitution that rendered him incapable of storing magical power. Despite this, he honed his physical body to the limit, fighting as a hunter to protect humanity from these creatures.
One day, Kengo undergoes a body modification experiment conducted by a mad scientist, granting him superhuman physical strength. Thus begins the tale of Kengo's unstoppable rise, relying solely on his sheer muscle power, without the aid of skills or magic!

altTitles.ja: ゴーストハンター

description.en: In a world where ghost hunters work under GMC (Ghost Management Company), a ghost hunter who wakes up in his younger brother's body searches for his brother's soul and gets one step closer to the truth surrounding the company.

title.en: The Male Leads Were Stolen by an Extra

altTitles.en: The Male Leads Were Taken Away by the Extra
The Male Leads Were Stolen by the Extra

description.en:
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

“I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.” 

“I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.” 

“Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.” 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way… 

“Do you know me?” 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

“What, I don’t know…”

“No, you know me. tell me Who am I?” 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

“How can I always hold your hand?” 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

“Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.” 

He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!

altTitles.ja: ブラックサージ

description.en: Nagi Kujo, a brilliant doctor who tirelessly treats patients in conflict zones, returns to his homeland, Japan, to seek treatment for his adoptive father, a benefactor who once saved him. However, upon his arrival, he discovers that his father has been murdered by an unknown assailant. Determined to uncover the truth, Nagi begins to delve into the mystery surrounding his father's death.

Prince Jin was eleven when he disappeared into the forest in the middle of the night. There, he met a mysterious being that took over his body and turned him into a hybrid with great strength. Five years later he returned and demanded land and wealth for his family. Thanks to his medallion, Jin proved that he was a prince, and therefore Queen Byuk Ha was forced to leave her post. Some people wanted to get rid of him by sending ninjas to kill him... But it won't be easy to destroy him!

The moment the company receives notice of a person subject to restructuring, With a roaring sound as if the sky had collapsed. And the world has changed. [The sale of this district has been decided.] [This will result in a workforce restructuring.] Restructuring for Lives Missions that you can capture to gain special powers If it's a miraculous prank, I'll do my best for it! "I found it. A way to live together." Restructuring candidate Lee Eunho's super-fast promotion starts now!

altTitles.th: ก๊วนป่วนชวนบุ๋งบุ๋ง

altTitles.ja: ぐらんぶる

description.en:
A new life begins for Kitahara Iori as he begins his college career near the ocean in Izu city, full of excitement for his new life. 
He will be moving into his uncle's diving store "Grand Blue." There he finds the ocean, beautiful women, and men that love diving and alcohol. 
Will Iori be able to live his dream college life?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10058/episode/318585) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/306-grand-blue-dreaming)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ «کیتاهارا ایوری» پسری است که برای شروع دوره دانشجویی خود به شهر دریایی «ایزو» می رود؛ او که از روبرو شدن با زندگی جدید خود اشتیاق فراوانی دارد به این فکر است که در فروشگاه لوازم غواصی عموی خود که به نام Grand Blue (گرند بلو) شناخته می شود مشغول به کار شود. آنجا او دریایی پر از دلخوشی را می یابد، دخترانی زیبا را به چشم می بیند و همچنین مردانی که عاشق غواصی هستند و وقت خودشان را به نوشیدن انواع نوشیدنی ها می گذرانند ملاقات می کند. حال باید دید که ایوری می تواند زندگی دانشجویی دلخواهش را در این شهر دنبال کند یا خیر؟!
description.ja: 海沿いの街で一人暮らしを始めた北原伊織は衝撃の大学デビューを果たす。出会ったのは美女とダイビング、そして愛すべき野郎ども！
description.ru: Новая жизнь Китахары Ёри начинается с момента поступления в колледж, который находится на берегу океана в городе Идзу. В предвкушении новых эмоций парень отправляется в дазин своего дяди «Необъятный океан». Здесь его ждет красивый океан, прекрасные женщины и мужчины, что любят дайвинг и алкоголь. Сможет ли Ёри прожить студенческую жизнь своей мечты?
description.pt-br: Uma nova vida começa para Kitahara Iori, que entrou na faculdade perto do mar, na cidade de Izu. Emocionado por um novo começo, ele se muda para casa do seu tio, uma loja de mergulho chamada "Grand Blue". Lá, ele encontra um lindo oceano, belas mulheres, e os homens que gostam de mergulho e álcool... Será que Iori vai ser capaz de viver sua tão sonhada vida universitária? Do mesmo autor de Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu, uma nova comédia começa!

altTitles.ja: ヒロイック・コンプレックス

description.en:
Misuzu Haruno, a handsome high school girl, has a secret identity—she is a super warrior known as Burning X who seeks to protect the peace. She wishes to become cute, just like the beautiful super heroine she admires, Blue Wing. But the truth is, Blue Wing is actually Aoi Ootori, an effeminate boy from the class next door! Indeed, Blue Wing is *his* secret identity, but he isn't exactly thrilled about it—he wants to be strong and more manly, just like his idol, Burning X.

This is a romantic comedy in which two people are unable to reveal their true identities to each other.
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о супергероях с сюрпризом.

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

altTitles.ja: 僕の心のヤバイやつ
僕ヤバ

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

**Awards:**
- Won the 2020 Next Manga Award in the Web category.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taishou Award.
- Won the top prize of the 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards.
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

description.en: The story of junior high school student new outlook on life. Its an inspiring tale of the many issues in our modern society. And the undue pressures of society to conform their standards instead of being yourself. For those who dealt with issues such as bullying, weight, and appearance. This series is a must read.

altTitles.ja: アライブ

description.en:
Hondo Akira was shot to death by the U.S. military for a crime he did not commit. However, he somehow survived and became a teacher at a girls’ high school. 

The objective of his assignment to this school? The key to that is in the hands of Tsukishima Hibiki, an ordinary high school girl in the art club… 

The story accelerates as Hondo, an out-of-the-ordinary egoistic gentleman, gets involved in his surroundings.
description.ja:
無実の罪を着せられ、米軍に射殺されたはずの男・本堂 明。しかし彼は生き永らえ女子高の教師となっていた。

彼がこの学校に赴任した目的とは？その鍵は美術部の普通の女子高生 月島 響が握っている―？

紳士なようで唯我独尊、規格外の男・本堂が周囲を巻き込み物語は加速していく。

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜英雄

description.en:
It's been 10 years since Takamichi reincarnated in hell. His Incubus power becomes stronger by having sex with women, but his growth peaked. 

"I'll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!"

Sexy & violent pretty girl battle fantasy!
description.ja: タカミチは魔界に転生して10年。魔界最強の大魔剣士で次期魔王の座すら譲られるほどになっていた…が、悩んでいた。女性との行為によって強くなる『インキュバス』のスキルツリーは既に行き詰まっていたのだ。インキュバスのスキルツリーを解き明かすため、意を決してゲートをくぐるタカミチを待っていたのは…薬師の美少女アウラや魔眼の暗殺者バイオレットとの…エッロすぎる出会いだった（笑）
description.pt-br: 10 anos desde que ele reencarnou no inferno ... O herói “Takamichi” está com problemas. Com o poder do “Incubus” de ficar mais forte fazendo sexo com mulheres, ele já não tinha mais inimigos e seu crescimento atingiu o pico. “Vou me mudar para uma nova área, esperem por mim, lindas mulheres do novo mundo!” Fantasia de batalha de menina bonita sexy e violenta!

altTitles.en: I Was Trash, I Am Trash, I Will Be Trash

description.ar: كان يُنظر اليه نظرة استصغار, اجبر على إلغاء خطوبته وتم قتله, ربما هذه هي الحياة التي ينبغي على القمامة عيشها…. ولكن جسده اٌخذ من قبلي, الممارس الاقوى كانغ كون زي. والان بما انني هنا, ساجعل منه الافضل! راقبني بينما استخدم هذا الجسد القمامة الذي املكه لادعس عليهم كالنمل
description.en: He was looked down on, forced to break off his engagement, he was murdered, maybe this is the life that trash should have… But he was taken over by me, the strongest cultivator, Cang Kun Zi, as I reborned. Now that I'm here, I'll make the best of it! Watch as I use this trash body of mine to trample upon you mere ants!
description.fr: Il a été regardé de haut, forcé de rompre ses fiançailles, il a été assassiné, c’est peut-être la vie que les ordures devraient avoir… Mais il a été repris par moi, le cultivateur le plus fort, Cang Kun Zi, quand je suis né à nouveau. Maintenant que je suis là, je vais faire de mon mieux ! Regardez comme j’utilise mon corps pour piétiner de simples fourmis !
description.pt:
Ele era subestimado, foi forçado a terminar seu noivado e foi assassinado. Talvez, esta seja a vida que um inútil mereça…  
No entanto, ele foi tomado por mim, o cultivador mais poderoso, Cang Kun Zi, quando renasci. E agora que estou aqui, superarei as adversidades! Testemunhe enquanto eu uso este meu corpo inócuo para pisar em vocês meras formigas!
description.ru: На него смотрели свысока, заставили разорвать помолвку, а затем убили. Возможно, такая жизнь и должна быть у неудачника… Но его тело стало моим, когда я возродился. Я сильнейший культиватор Цан Куньцзы, и теперь, когда я здесь, я сделаю всё возможное! Вы увидите, как я использую это тело, чтобы топтать вас, муравьи!

title.en: Sensei to Seito wa, Ai wo Shiranai.

altTitles.ja: 先生と生徒は、愛を知らない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Sensei to Seito wa, Ai wo Shiranai.

description.vi: Người mà tôi yêu thương nhất trên đời hóa ra không hề yêu thương tôi. Tôi lúc này đây không còn cách nào khác ngoài căm ghét chính người ấy. Đây là một câu chuyện giữa hai con người không biết yêu dần thu hút lẫn nhau.

altTitles.ja: T・Pぼん

description.en: There exists a secret organization that has members traveling across time to save people from their wrongful deaths. Bon Namihira accidentally learn about the Time Patrol, and is recruited as an apprentice member. Together with Ream, the patroller in charge of mentoring him , Bon goes to various historical periods to rescue innocent people, trying not to alter history in the process.

altTitles.ja: ゾンビマン

description.en: A mysterious figure holds fifty-two black cards that represent humankind's fears. Knives, clocks, mirrors and even tests! And as his stories end Hino gives us even more terror with Zombie Man, Rotten Rain and Horror at the Wax Museum!

title.en: Josou ga Shishunki ni Ataeru Eikyou o Kangaeyou

altTitles.ja: 女装が思春期に与える影響を考えよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou ga Shishunki ni Ataeru Eikyou wo Kangaeyou

altTitles.en: Let's Consider the Impact of Cross-Dressing on Adolescence
A Phoenix on the Ninth Floor of Heaven

description.en: Feng Ming is on his way to school when he saves a child about to die, losing his own life in the process. He is given the chance to cross time and space to have a new life and awakens in the body of the crown prince of Xi Lei. This crown prince, however, does not have the high status that Feng Ming expects. Instead, the prince regent Rong Tian holds the highest power in Xi Lei. Rong Tian notices the crown prince’s sudden change in demeanor along with Feng Ming’s habit of suddenly blurting out modern words and phrases, and becomes interested in him...
description.fr: Feng Ming se rend à l'école lorsqu'il sauve un enfant sur le point de mourir, perdant ainsi la vie. Il a la possibilité de traverser le temps et l'espace pour avoir une nouvelle vie et se réveille dans le corps du prince héritier de Xi Lei. Ce prince héritier, cependant, n'a pas le statut élevé auquel Feng Ming s'attend. Au lieu de cela, le prince régent Rong Tian détient le plus haut pouvoir à Xi Lei. Rong Tian remarque le changement soudain de comportement du prince héritier et l'habitude qu'a Feng Ming de prononcer des mots et des phrases modernes.

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

altTitles.ja-ro: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara ja Nai

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

title.en: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta [Jugushi] ~"Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasen ga, Sono Seinou wa Artifact-kyuu nari......!~

altTitles.ja: Ｓランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】～『呪いのアイテム』しか作れませんが、その性能はアーティファクト級なり……！～

altTitles.en: I'm a Curse Crafter, and I Don't Need an S-Rank Party!
My S-Rank Party Fired Me for Being a Cursificer: I Can Only Make “Cursed Items”, but They're Artifact Class!

altTitles.vi: Chỉ biết chế tạo trang bị nguyền rủa, tôi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội cấp S

description.en:
Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment!

Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
description.ja:
【呪具師】のゲイルは大して貢献していないと、パーティがＳランクに昇格したと同時に無一文で追い出される。しかし、彼らは理解していなかった。ゲイルの作る呪具は、そこらの聖遺物や勇者の装備をも凌駕する性能を誇っていたことに…。ゲイルは呪具を活かして一人で生きていこうと決意しーー。

風変わりな職業・呪具師の大活躍が新感覚の爽快感で大反響!!
description.vi: Gaile, một nguyền cụ sư tài năng, đã bị các đồng đội phản bội khi tổ đội đạt được hạng S. Họ không ngờ ràng các nguyền cụ của anh ta còn mạnh hơn cả thánh tích và các trang bị thần thoại. Sau khi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội, Gaile quyết định tự mình kiếm sống bằng những nguyền cụ do mình tạo ra. Chuyến phiêu lưu của anh chàng nguyền cụ sư chính thức bắt đầu.
description.pt-br:
A versão mangá de um dos romances de fantasia isekai mais populares de Shousetsuka ni Narou!

Gaile, um Cursificer, fica sem um tostão quando é expulso de seu grupo assim que chegam ao Rank S. Aparentemente ele não estava contribuindo o suficiente?! Mas eles não tinham percebido que seus itens amaldiçoados superam até mesmo relíquias sagradas e equipamentos lendários!

Gaile decide tentar ganhar a vida por conta própria com seus itens amaldiçoados.

title.en: Watashi no Hara no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.ja: 私の胎の中の化け物

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Tai no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.vi: Con quái vật trong tử cung của tôi

description.en:
***Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.***

Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends, and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. 

However, on her period, Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor, and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice, but when she became aware of it, the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature.

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 貴方の中の“悪意”を目覚めさす。衝撃のサスペンス!!優等生で、先生からの信頼も厚い女子中学生の神城千夏。友達とも仲良く、誰のことも嫌いになんてならない幸せな日々を過ごしていた…はずだった。しかし、千夏は気づいてしまった。担任の塚本のことが嫌いだと、周りに対してとてもいらいらしていることを。フタをして、見ないふりをしていた自分の気持ちを自覚した時、千夏の中にいた“化け物”が暴れ出し、本性を現し始めた。
description.vi:
Sẽ ra sao nếu một ngày những biến cố, bất công của cuộc đời liên tiếp ập đến, để rồi đánh thức con ác ma đang trú ngụ trong trái tim bạn?
Kamishiro Chinatsu, nữ sinh cấp hai, là một học sinh giỏi, đồng thời còn là lớp trưởng được giáo viên hết mực tín nhiệm. Một cô bé hòa đồng với bạn bè và trải qua những ngày vui vẻ mà không ghét lấy một ai.
Tuy nhiên, Chinatsu nhận thấy cảm xúc căm ghét của cô bé dành cho Tsukada, giáo viên chủ nhiệm của mình đang một lớn dần, đến mức khiến cô bé chán ghét tất cả mọi thứ xung quanh. Nhận ra chuyện này, cô bé đã tìm cách che đậy và quay lưng lại với nó. Nhưng rồi "con quái vật" vốn trú ngụ bên trong Chinatsu bắt đầu hành động và bộc lộ bản chất thật của mình, thứ mà cô bé đã luôn muốn trốn tránh.

altTitles.ja: BLEACH カラー版
ブリーチ
ブリーチ カラー版

description.en:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.   
  
Monochrome version won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
description.es:
Ichigo Kurosaki siempre ha sido capaz de ver fantasmas, pero esta habilidad no cambia su vida tanto como su encuentro cercano con Rukia Kuchiki, una Segadora de Almas y miembro de la misteriosa Sociedad de las Almas. Mientras lucha contra un hueco, un espíritu maligno que se aprovecha de los humanos que muestran energía psíquica, Rukia intenta prestarle a Ichigo algunos de sus poderes para que pueda salvar a su familia, pero para su sorpresa, Ichigo absorbe hasta la última gota de su energía. Ahora que ya es un auténtico Segador de Almas, Ichigo aprende rápidamente que el mundo que habita está lleno de peligrosos espíritus y, junto con Rukia, que está recuperando lentamente sus poderes, el trabajo de Ichigo consiste en proteger a los inocentes de los huecos y ayudar a los propios espíritus a encontrar la paz.  
  
Versión monocroma ganó el 50º Premio Shogakukan Manga en la categoría Shounen.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do mangá Bleach. A história gira em torno de Kurosaki Ichigo um estudante de 15 anos que tem uma estranha capacidade de ver, tocar e falar com espíritos de pessoas mortas. Logo que o Shinigami (Deus da Morte) Kuchiki Rukia toma conhecimento dos poderes dele ela decide investigá-lo, e acaba em uma luta com um Hollow que foi atraído pelo forte poder espiritual de Ichigo, antes de ser derrotada pela criatura, Rukia passa seus poderes a Ichigo, o qual se torna um Shinigami, e após derrotar o Hollow ingressa em uma jornada para proteger os humanos e os espíritos da ameaça dos Hollows.

title.en: I Just Want to Game in Peace

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Zhǐ Xiǎng Ānjìng De Dǎ Yóuxì

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Play Games Quietly
I Just Want to Play the Game Quietly

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Zhi Xiang Anjing De Da Youxi

description.en: Dimensional storms have descended and many extradimensional areas have appeared on Earth. All kinds of mysterious extradimensional lives are born in these extradimensional areas. In order to become strong, humans started to enter these dangerous areas to hunt and kill extradimensional creatures. But I, Zhou Wen, have made these extradimensional areas into instance dungeons in my mobile game. By levelling up my game character, I will be levelling up my strength in reality. When others are risking their lives, I’m here getting stronger by gaming.

altTitles.ja: 俺たちのフィールド

description.en: A soccer loving boy Takasugi Kazuya dreams of playing soccer with his Japan League star father at the National Yoyogi Stadium. The story follows Kazuya's life as he travels to Argentina, plays for Yamaki, and goes to the 1998 World Cup in France.

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王 OCGストラクチャーズ
遊☆戯☆王 オフィシャルカードゲーム ストラクチャーズ
遊戯王 OCGストラクチャーズ
遊戯王 オフィシャルカードゲーム ストラクチャーズ

altTitles.pt-br: O Rei dos Jogos! Estruturas OCG

description.en:
Shoma Yusa, a new kid who moved to Tokyo with his sister, learns how to make friends through Dueling and creating Structure Decks.  
  
*This series is based on the real life Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, known in the west as TCG) and how to build the best deck, based on the latest rule- and banlist.*
description.pt-br:
Shoma Yusa, um novo garoto que se mudou para Tóquio com sua irmã, aprende a fazer amigos através de Duelos e criando Decks Estruturais. 

*Esta série é baseada no jogo da vida real de Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, conhecido no ocidente como TCG) e como construir o melhor deck, com base nas últimas regras e banlists.*

description.en:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ

description.en: There exist familiars who have the power to grant one wish to a chosen girl. However, in return that girl must then become a magical girl and fight against witches, evil creatures born from curses that are responsible for murders and suicides. A schoolgirl named Madoka Kaname and her friend Sayaka Miki are approached by a familiar named Kyubey and a magical girl named Mami Tomoe with offers of becoming magical girls. Another mysterious magical girl named Homura Akemi tries to prevent Madoka from agreeing to the contract.

title.en: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: ハズレ判定から始まったチート魔術士生活

altTitles.zh: 从废柴判定开始的魔术士人生

altTitles.en: Life as a Cheat Magician that began with a False Judgment

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)
description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！

description.en:
Two women, hidden away in a vast estate, who save each other through their roller coaster of a relationship!
Bai Yuetao, wife of a rich businessman, blames herself for her husband's skirt-chasing tendencies. After spending another night alone in their lavish residence, she sees a graceful woman appear in her newly bought western mirror. This woman calls herself "Butterfly Dream" and says that she can teach Bai Yuetao how to "hook" her husband's heart. But the price she demands?
Bai Yuetao's body.

altTitles.ja: 円環のエモーションズ

description.en: Arakura Arato is a high school student who is always alert to danger and lives a low-key life. One day, his life changes drastically when he is suddenly attacked by a superpower user named Koki Rara. The power of “EMO”—an ability formed from strong emotions.
description.id: Arakura Arato adalah seorang siswa SMA yang selalu waspada terhadap bahaya dan hidup tanpa menonjol. Suatu hari, kehidupannya berubah drastis ketika tiba-tiba dia diserang oleh seorang pengguna kekuatan super bernama Koki Rara. Arato kemudian terseret dalam pertarungan antara para pengguna kekuatan “EMO”—kemampuan yang terbentuk dari emosi yang kuat. Mampukah Arato bertahan dengan kekuatan “barrier” miliknya yang tidak memiliki daya serang…!?
description.ja: 危険を警戒し、目立たず生きる高校生・荒倉アラト。 ある日突然異能力者・好綺羅羅に襲われ、日常は 崩壊する。強い感情が異能力に転化される「ＥＭＯ能力者」どうしの バトルに巻き込まれたアラトは、バリアという攻撃力０の能力で戦い抜く事が出来るのか…!?

altTitles.ja: 春雷は、あきらめない

title.en: Maou Gun Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Ningen datta

altTitles.en: The Maou Army's Strongest Magician Was a Human

altTitles.ru: Самый сильный волшебник армии Мао оказался человеком

altTitles.ja: 魔王軍最強の魔術師は人間だった

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔王軍最強的魔術師是人類

altTitles.en: The Strongest Magician in the Demon Lord's Army Was a Human

description.en: “Maou Army’s strongest magician” I’m called. Ike, a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic, he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he can’t tell other demons. “I, actually am a human you know.” Using modern knowledge to keep his secret, he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maou’s army.

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.ja: 犬木加奈子の血まみれ絵本

description.en:
(This manga is unusual amongst Kanako Inuki's manga due to the highly exaggerated gore (and emphasis on it) compared to her usual manga)

A gruesome picture book-like manga. The cover was originally considered to be so gorey it was censored with a special dust jacket.

title.en: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru @comic

altTitles.en: My Youth Romantic Comedy Is Wrong, As I Expected @ comic

altTitles.ru: Как и ожидал, моя школьная романтическая жизнь не удалась @комикс

altTitles.th: กะแล้วชีวิตรักวัยรุ่นของผมมันต้องไม่สดใสเลยซักนิด

altTitles.ja: やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。@comic

altTitles.vi: Chuyện tình thanh xuân bi hài của tôi quả nhiên là sai lầm @comic

description.en: Hachiman Hikigaya is a cynic. He believes "youth" is a crock-a sucker's game, an illusion woven from failure and hypocrisy. Unsurprisingly, he's not the most popular guy. Meanwhile, there's Yukino Yukinoshita - brilliant, beautiful, and chillier than winter in Antarctica. Would you believe she's not exactly beloved by her classmates either? The unlikely pair gets forced into a club dedicated to helping solve their fellow students' problems. But will an ice queen and a screw-up really be able to help anybody?
description.ru:
Эта история о школьнике по имени Хачиман Хикигая, который обладает искаженными взглядами на жизнь. У него нет ни друзей, ни подруг, а на вопрос о том, какая у него мечта, можно услышать лишь: «Ее нет». Но не все безразличны к апатии Хачимана. Его учительница просит школьника стать волонтером сервис-клуба, в котором также находится самая красивая девушка школы. Как изменит членство в клубе жизнь Хачимана? Появится ли теперь у него мечта?  
  
Одна из двух манга-адаптаций ранобэ Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.

altTitles.ja: 犬がヒトになる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

altTitles.vi: Ponta nhà tôi bỗng dưng hóa thành người?!

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.
description.vi: Một ngày đẹp trời bỗng dưng toàn bộ chó trong một thị trấn nọ hóa thành người...Và cô nàng Saki phải sống(vật lộn) với một bé Husky hóa thành trai đẹp XD

title.en: The Girl with the Sanpaku Eyes

altTitles.ja: 三白眼ちゃんは伝えたい

altTitles.en: The Feelings of a Girl with Sanpaku Eyes

altTitles.vi: Cô Nàng Mắt Tam Bạch Muốn Bày Tỏ

description.en:
This is a retelling of how Amane and Katou met, from The Story of a Girl with Sanpaku Eyes.  
  
Trivia: Sanpaku (三白) is a Japanese term meaning "three whites". It is generally referred to in English as "sanpaku eyes" and refers to eyes in which the white space above or below the iris is visible.
description.vi: Xin giới thiệu Mizuno Amane, một cô nàng với cặp mắt tam bạch (sanpuku) dữ tợn và trái tim thiếu nữ dịu dàng! Amane đã phải lòng anh chàng bàn bên Katou mất rồi! Rồi bây giờ sẽ phải làm sao để bày tỏ nỗi lòng với chàng trai ấy đây?!

description.en: Three hundred years ago, he was know as the great Martial Emperor, but the night before his wedding he was betrayed and killed by his fiancee; three hundred years later he is reborn, and this time nothing will be able to stop him from his goal to dominate the three realms!!!

title.en: Aru Hi, Totsuzen Gal no Iinazuke ga Dekita

altTitles.ja: ある日、突然ギャルの許嫁ができた

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Hi, Totsuzen Gyaru no Iinazuke ga Dekita

altTitles.en: One Day, I Suddenly Got Myself a Gal Fiancée​
One Day, Out of the Blue, I Got a Gal's Forgiving Wife

description.en: Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancée!?
description.ja: 「ねぇねぇ、なんでいつも寝たふりしてるの？」スクールカースト上位に君臨する陽キャギャル華月美蘭が度々、底辺オタクの俺こと永沢修二に声をかけてくる。思わせぶりな態度に戸惑っていたら、まさかの許嫁宣言！？
